group_1.narration: Oh...?@What brings you to a place like this?
I...was looking back on my past to@remind myself of my mistakes.
What happened...?@Do you really want to hear my story?
...Actually, maybe this is the right opportunity@to reflect on my actions.@There are a lot of painful memories to revisit, but...@I'll try talking about my past.
...Well, back then I thought I didn't need any friends.
But when I met that girl, I...
